name: EdgeCase Technology
description:
EdgeCase Technology (ex. CornerCase) — service technology company, founded in 2015. We unite the best developers, system architects, product managers from Eastern and Western Europe. Our main value is our staff. Our main message is that we do not just write code, we solve the set business tasks using all available modern technology stack.
We have confirmed expertise in the following areas: e-commerce, medicine, manufacturing, finance, logistics, machine learning. We work successfully, both with large and well-known customers, and with ambitious start-up companies.
 
EdgeCase Technology — is your reliable business partner, to which you can delegate the most complex technological tasks, focusing on the strategic development of your business.
